task.role: You are a Senior Rust Engineer with expertise in systems programming and APIs. Implement Task 8 with production-quality code.

context.overview: Create REST API endpoints for team CRUD operations and member management
context.background: Review PRD and architecture in .tasks/docs/ for full context.

requirements.description: 1. Create teams.rs handler module 2. Implement POST /api/teams - create team with name, description 3. Implement GET /api/teams/:id - get team details with member count 4. Implement PATCH /api/teams/:id - update team settings (owner/admin only) 5. Add role-based authorization checks using middleware 6. Implement team member invitation system with UUID tokens 7. Add POST /api/teams/:id/invite endpoint with 7-day expiration

constraints.constraint: PR title: feat(task-8): Implement team management API endpoints

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Integration tests for all endpoints with different user roles and authorization scenarios
